      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMarble(int numberOfPlayer, int x, int y)
      this method will chang the x and y then with new x and y add marble to a part chosen base on old x and y adding marble to a spot means changing that spot value in map of that part.
      int checkWin()
      this method check all full spots and check if they make a trial with 4 other spot with the same value(number of player) or not .
      void createMap()
      create an empty visual map
      int findTrail(int i, int j, int numberOfPlayer)
      this method move to 8 possible direction from chosen spot and find and return longest trial of marbles with the a=same number of player more information on first while which is for going up

      int[][] getMap() 
      void printMap()
      print visual map
      void rotatePart(int numberOfPart, int direction)
      this method rotate map of chosen part using rotate method in part class each rotate cause map to rotate 45 degree so for round clock rotation we must rotate 2 times and for clock wise rotation we must rotate 8 times
      void updateMap()
      update map based on changes on map of 4 parts
      void updateVisualMap()
      update visual map and put players sign base on map changes

      • addMarble

        public void addMarble(int numberOfPlayer,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        this method will chang the x and y then with new x and y add marble to a part chosen base on old x and y adding marble to a spot means changing that spot value in map of that part.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayer - number of player of the marble we want to add it
        x - x of location
        y - y of location

      • rotatePart

        public void rotatePart(int numberOfPart,
                       int direction)
        this method rotate map of chosen part using rotate method in part class each rotate cause map to rotate 45 degree so for round clock rotation we must rotate 2 times and for clock wise rotation we must rotate 8 times
        Parameters:
        numberOfPart - number of part we want to rotate it
        direction - direction we want to rotate part

      • checkWin

        public int checkWin()
        this method check all full spots and check if they make a trial with 4 other spot with the same value(number of player) or not .
        Returns:
        number of player of spots which are starting point or ending point of a trial

      • findTrail

        public int findTrail(int i,
                     int j,
                     int numberOfPlayer)
        this method move to 8 possible direction from chosen spot and find and return longest trial of marbles with the a=same number of player more information on first while which is for going up
        Parameters:
        i - i of location
        j - j of location
        numberOfPlayer - number of player we want to find a trial of it
        Returns:
        max length of trial that chosen location is a starting or ending point for it .

      • getMap

        public int[][] getMap()
        Returns:
        map of play ground

      • getCountOfMarbles

        public int getCountOfMarbles()
        Returns:
        number of marbles which are in play ground
